GIVEWAY.Title: 10k lists Giveway
GIVEWAY.Body:
In order to thank you properly for the 10k lists created on the app, a 60 days timecard giveway has been created, it will last until Feb. 09.
 Thank you for using this app, I hope it helped you a lot, the app is what it is thanks to you.

Quick_list_create: Criar uma lista rapidamente (removida assim que completo)
Do you really want to reset the list?: Você realmente quer resetar a lista?
Verification_mail_sent: Email de verificação enviado, por favor verifique sua caixa de entrada
Not_verified: Seu email ainda não foi verificado, por favor cheque sua caixa de entrada
Lodestone_already_used: Esse personagem já está sendo utilizado
Anonymous_Warning: Você precisa criar uma conta para evitar perder suas listas e permitir mais funcionalidades como filtro adaptativo.
Upgrade_list: Recria a lista com a última versão da aplicação
List_popup_title: Gerando a lista novamente, por favor aguarde
List_popup_p: Isso deve ser rápido, aqui está um gif enquanto você espera
Not_own_list_outdated: Essa lista é antiga, por favor peça para o dono gerá-la novamente
Own_list_outdated_before_button: Essa lista é antiga, por favor crie ela novamente usando
Add_all_recipes: Adicionar todos resultados a uma lista
List_fork: Copiar a lista para sua conta
List_not_found: Lista não encontrada ou você não tem acesso a ela
Share_link_copied: Link da lista copiado ao clipboard
Patreon_popup_body: Assim que a base de usuários crescer, o FFXIV Teamcraft irá precisar de um host maior para que tudo funcione direito com bom tempo de resposta. Por conta disso, precisamos do seu apoio para garantir que temos fundos suficientes para pagar a hospedagem que você merece, e garantir sua experiência com a ferramenta a melhor possível
Patreon_popup_body_end: Por favor considere em ajudar nós no patreon, fazendo isso você ajuda o time e os usuários
Email_sent: Um email foi enviado com as instruções para trocar sua senha.
Copy_item_name_to_clipboard: Copiar o nome do item para o clipboard

VERIFICATION.Title: Profile validation
VERIFICATION.Guide: To verify your account, paste this code: "{{userId}}" inside your Lodestone profile biography and click the button below.

HELP.Welcome: Welcome to profile page, this is the place where you can see and edit your own profile.
HELP.Edit: By clicking on the edit icon, you can edit the character linked to your FFXIV Teamcraft account.
HELP.Masterbooks: You can put your unlocked masterbooks on your profile, this will allow for warnings in the future when you can't craft an item because you don't have the masterbook.

LISTS.Shared_lists: Lists you have write access to

IMPORT.Title: Import list from external website
IMPORT.Paste_link_step_title: Paste your link to the external list
IMPORT.Give_list_name: Give your new list a name

LIST.Add_all_alarms: Add all alarms for this list

BUTTONS.Add_link_description: Create a custom link for this list
BUTTONS.Create_template_description: Create a template link for this list, which will create a copy of the list for whoever opens it
BUTTONS.Copy_template_url_description: Copy the template link for this list, which will create a copy of the list for whoever opens it
BUTTONS.Share_description: Copy share link to your clipboard
BUTTONS.Delete_warning: Deleting a list can't be undone

LIST_DETAILS.Missing_tags_before_button: This list is shown as community list but has no tags, please add some tags using
LIST_DETAILS.No_book: Missing book, click to navigate to profile

HELP.Title: List details
HELP.Inventory: You can switch to inventory view, where the app simulates an inventory to show you what you're supposed to have, it removes items  already used for crafts you've already done.
HELP.Reset_progression: You can reset the progression of the list entirely using the refresh button, upon confirmation this will set all progression to 0.
HELP.Upgrade: You can upgrade your list to the latest version using this button, it recreates the list entirely and keeps progression. You'll be asked to upgrade if your list is outdated.
HELP.Fork: You can fork a list, which means creating a copy of it in its actual state to your account, this works for any list.
HELP.Filters: You can filter list items, using your account you can apply filters to see only what you can do, you can also hide items that are already done in this panel.
HELP.Area_breakdown: By toggling Area Breakdown, you can order data based on the area they are obtainable in order to lower the teleport fees.
HELP.Pricing_mode: When entering pricing mode, you can enter the price of each item you bought, and enter the expected sell price in order to know how much benefits you get from a list.
HELP.Requirements: By clicking on the requirements icon, you can open a dialog showing what is required by a given item, or what it is required for.
HELP.Alarms: When an item is a timed node, you can click on the alarm button to setup a sound alarm when it spawns, the alarm will be played even if you're not on the list, you just need to be on the website.
HELP.Comments: You can add comments to any item row, allowing you to provide more informations (not linked to the item, only to the list row) or discuss on it. Comments are limited to 140 characters and 10 comments per item.
HELP.Colors: Item name colors have a signification, this one is for items ready to be crafted, which means that you have everything to craft the item. This one is for items crafted which means that you have already done this item
HELP.Map_markers: Whenever you see this icon, click on it to get a map marker, which is way easier to read than X,Y coordinates.
HELP.Public_list: Setting a list to public adds it to the public lists section, THIS IS NOT REQUIRED TO SHARE A LIST
HELP.Obtention_details: Each item row has icons in the top-right section of the row, clicking on each icon will give you more details on how to obtain the corresponding item.
HELP.Labels: When adding a list to public lists, don't forget to add proper labels to it
HELP.Custom_layout: You can fully customize your layout, export it and import the layout of a friend. This layout only concern you and is stored in your browser, it will be applied to every list you display using this browser.

HELP.Welcome: Welcome to the recipes page, this page is meant to search, filter and add recipes to crafting lists.
HELP.Filter: When you open the Filter tab, a lot of filters become available to you, you can check them and change their values to find what you're looking for.
HELP.Add_to_list: Once you found the item you're looking for, you can enter an amount and click on the 'add to list' icon, this will ask you where you want to put the item, then it'll add the item to the list you choose at the quantity you entered.
HELP.Quick_list: You can create quick lists by clicking on the 'Quick List' button, this will instantly create a list with the name of the item, that will be deleted upon completion.
HELP.Add_results: The 'Add results to a list' button adds every single item in the current result set to a given list, but be carefull, QUANTITY IS ALWAYS SET TO 1 WHEN USING THIS.

PERMISSIONS.Propagate_changes: Propagate permissions to lists inside the workshop
PERMISSIONS.Propagate_changes_done: Changes propagated to lists inside the workshop

HOME_PAGE.title: Create lists, share, contribute, craft
HOME_PAGE.support_content_discord: If you have any troubles using the tool, don't be shy, pay us a visit on discord !
HOME_PAGE.support_comtent_facebook: You can also find us on facebook
HOME_PAGE.contribute_content: If you want to contribute to the tool, feel free to check the code on github and create some Pull Requests !
HOME_PAGE.changelog: To get every news about the website, each changes, please refer to the changelog.

GET_STARTED.Title: Get started
GET_STARTED.First_list_content: Navigate to the recipes page by clicking the link below and create your first list !
GET_STARTED.Create_alarm_content: Navigate to the alarms page by clicking the link below and create your first node notification to never miss a spawn !
GET_STARTED.Create_rotations_content: Navigate to the rotations page by clicking the link below and create rotations for ingame crafting, to test with your own stats, foods, and HQ ingredients !
GET_STARTED.Access_wiki_content: Navigate to the wiki page by clicking the link below. This page has some documentation for the general website usage, to guide you to make the most out of it and help you as much as possible

COMMISSION_BOARD.Title: Commission board
COMMISSION_BOARD.No_commissions: No opened commissions on your server
COMMISSION_BOARD.Chat_warning: Remember to never give your credentials in the chat, nobody should ask for them. Using this chat to use the platform for RMT will result in a permanent ban from the website and the case forwarded to Square Enix
COMMISSION_BOARD.Chat_hint: Tip: you can send a message by doing Ctrl + Enter
COMMISSION_BOARD.New_commission_warning: Creating a commission from this list will remove it from your lists (but won't delete the list), you won't be able to add more items nor change amounts on it.
COMMISSION_BOARD.Price_hint: The price you want to pay for this commission
COMMISSION_BOARD.Confirm_fire: Are you sure you want to fire this user from the commission?
COMMISSION_BOARD.Confirm_hire: Are you sure you want to hire this user?
COMMISSION_BOARD.No_server_history: The server has no archived commissions
COMMISSION_BOARD.Rating_description: Please take a moment to rate the other user
COMMISSION_BOARD.Confirm_archive: Are you sure? This can't be undone.
COMMISSION_BOARD.Confirm_withdraw: Are you sure you want to withdraw from the commission? This can't be undone.
COMMISSION_BOARD.New_things_notification: There's new things to check in your commission board
